definition: companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together
variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
variant of 貿易伙伴|贸易伙伴[mao4 yi4 huo3 ban4]

sentences.english: Jack was one of his old compatriots.
sentences.chinese: 傑克是他的老夥伴之一。

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上幹活的木匠將斧子傳給下面的夥伴。

sentences.english: Fang is Hagrid's pet and companion.
sentences.chinese: 牙牙是海格的寵物，也是夥伴。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其實，以企業爲主導的社會夥伴關係面對種種的限制。

sentences.english: The mission of this army colonel and his two fellow taikonauts will last about 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 這位上校和他的兩位航天員夥伴持續40分鐘的任務。

sentences.english: Hal is a business genius and had reached the top of the tree before he was twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡同哈爾一起出去，因爲他是一個很有趣的夥伴。

sentences.english: These ties among our people are the life blood of our emerging partnership.
sentences.chinese: 我們人民之間的紐帶是我們新興夥伴關係的生命力。

sentences.english: It has teamed up with several partners to develop its Google TV platform.
sentences.chinese: 它已經和其他幾個夥伴合作起來開發谷歌電視平臺。

sentences.english: You should have at least two partners.
sentences.chinese: 你至少需要兩個夥伴一起活動。

sentences.english: Over the years, Zhang Shuang has become a close friend to many of the children.
sentences.chinese: 這些年來，張爽早已成爲孩子們的好夥伴。

sentences.english: When I saw that my partner was just bein' friendly.
sentences.chinese: 當我看見我的夥伴不過是有點友善。

sentences.english: Wuxi Deputy harmony is your loyalty to the partnership.
sentences.chinese: 無錫和諧幫辦是你忠誠的夥伴。

sentences.english: Get into a car with your partner and drive around the track for a bit.
sentences.chinese: 和你的夥伴一起上車並在跑道上試開一下。

sentences.english: I was speaking with my business partner, who had just told me about Farrah.
sentences.chinese: 我父親打電話給我時，我正在和我的商業夥伴講話。

sentences.english: Fourth, we should endeavor to strengthen the BRICS partnership for common development.
sentences.chinese: 第四，大力加強金磚國家共同發展的夥伴關係。

sentences.english: The best parter for both music and fashionable mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 不僅是享受音樂的好夥伴，更是時尚手機的最佳拍檔。

definition: member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
abbr. for 東南亞國協|东南亚国协[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 Xie2]
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
